name: engadget.com - Readable articles
description: For people who have a hard time seeing their grey font.
additional_info:
I had to squint to see the articles on their website, and that's just horrible to do, in my opinion. In this style, you will have the option of changing the colour to your liking, as well font size and font face.

Default is black 16px. To edit font face, you must de-comment the code for that; Just remove the comment tags and tweak to suit. Site comments will also be affected, but not usernames when font face is enabled.
